There are two things I would like to do with JUnit.
1.  Run a bunch of test=
s on a class without junit creating a new
instance of the class for each te=
st.  I know you can use the
BeforeClass and AfterClass methods to set stati=
c data but that is so ugly.

2.  It would be nice to have a chain of test w=
here if one failed it
would quit and not run any more.  Maybe this is alrea=
dy available.  If
it is please let me know how to do it.

Thanks
Brian
